channel.title: Trying to find a snare sound!
channel.description: I’m trying to match a snare with the one from the song “litty again”-Meek Mill and Tory Lanez. It’s like a pretty classic trap snare. The closest I got was the snare from “Dollar” pitched up

item.title: Trying to find a snare sound!
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Nah. I thought the same*, but there’s an element in that trap snare that can’t be reproduced using Dollar/808 snare.

I thought it might be two 808 snares, one pitched up an octave, but it’s not.
It’s an 808 plus a sharp, tonal sound pitched up.

It would probably be clear what the other element is if the trap snare was played at half speed.

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to find a snare sound!

item.title: Trying to find a snare sound!

item.description:
With some automation on the dollar snare it could sound exactly like it

item.description:
WAVZ:

litty again

The reference snare is the ‘classic’ (i.e. massively and tediously over-used) Trap snare.

 
[Edit]

Hah, seems I’m not alone in feeling this way…
